name: Internal Organ Failure
description:
You finally made it through Disease College and now it is time for your first real assignment! You found a juicy human body to infect. Find the vital organs and destroy them to fulfill your destiny.

This game is a 2D 2Stick-Shooter. It is build to be played with a XBox 360 Controller but keyboad is also an option.

So far the game consists of an open world and three boss fights. If all organs are fully infected, you win.

Controls:

Left Stick/WASD - move around

Right Stick/Arrow Keys - look around and aim

RT/Space - shoot

Made during the Tasty Leftovers Jam.
